column3:
“Genetics: Haze x Northern Lights x Skunk x Highland Oaxacan Gold

Looks: Absolutely beautiful.  Light green with some of the most amazing pistils I’ve ever seen.  Hairs are long, mustard/creamsicle colored, and upon further review through a microscope, decked out with amber trichs.  Sugary as all hell, a gorgeous representation of the strain.

Smell: Skunk comes through heavy in the smell, lots of Haze notes too....”
“Tj's MTF is a frosty winterfresh bite into a peppermint party kine kind that will have you seeing aurora borialis in no time!”

“The fact that Leafly lists two Alaskan" Thunder Fucks makes me a little crazy. Alaskan Thunder Fuck (ATF) is listed as a Sativa and Matanuska Thunder Fuck (MTF) is listed as a hybrid. Matanuska Thunder Fuck is named after the Matanuska-Susitna Valley in Alaska
column5: which is revered for rich volcanic soil and it's intense summer growing season. I lived in the Mat-Su valley in the late...”"

column3: “Matanuska or Alaskan" thunderfuck or "Tundra" from the Matanuska region of Alaska. Tundra is Alaskan for grasslands and this plant has an interesting history I won't go into here
column5: geeks!) It is a SATIVA DOM hybrid crossed with the Alaskan Indica TUNDRA. God
column6: I love these strains... constantly changing
column7: from trippy and lost in thought and "I'm moving in slow motion" to happy

column3: “This is quite possibly one of the strongest strains of marijuana i have ever had the liberty to inhale. It has one of the purest taste and fast acting effects. I felt very aroused and energetic during the course of the high. From the first hit you are set at a very high peak that will keep you buzzed for well over 3 hours.”

“Migraine pain 6; nausea 4 when I medicated round 1900 or so. Takes bout 5 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. Head high heavy but not overwhelming. Hard to do much but got a workout in. Maybe I'm just tired. Body high very nice. Tastes piney to me. Highly recommend for after work/evening/weekend use for pain/nausea.”

“The last guy to rate this doesn't know what he's talking about. If you eat the bud raw without anything being activated, you're not going to experience anything aside from the flavor of the bud itself, let alone from a pinch". Do not try to consume in the same manner as it will be wasted. If you want to eat your cannabis
column4: I suggest you read online about making edibles
column5: understand the method for decarbing your cannab...”"

column3: “Man I can't say enough good things about this bud. The high is just perfect, nice mellow body high with no anxious feels. I can take a nice bing rip and be perfect. Nice earthy taste, very pleasant and uplifting.”
“The effects are like sitting on clouds. I would use this for headaches. The taste is spicy🍂 and flowery… like a sunflower seed🌼.”

“Pine, alfalfa, spinach, kale, kelp, seaweed. Buds are light and airy. smoke is light and lightly perfumed with a hint of hops, This is a personal favorite going back to the early 90's. Used to knock people out with a 5' bong and the Alaskan version of this strain...lol! Hits immediately, very powerful. Eyes start spinning. Had to put it down after a few hits. Made me dizzy.through the vape tastes like cool air and ma...”

“This was from the 2013 Seattle Cannabis Cup winning crop from TJ's Organic Garden. It was really incredible. I've enjoyed everything that comes from this grower, and the Matanuska is no exception. It's dense and white, hits like a hard sativa-dominant hybrid should. It's energetic and happy. The aroma and flavor are super minty, and it's excellent when vaped.”
“My favorite strain, as others have mentioned its phenomenal for pain relief.”

“MTF or ATF is another one of those strains that has a hazy history and a lot of different accounts of where / what it actually came from.  Half the dispensaries are listing it as Sativa and half are listing it as Indica, roughly.  Personally I've tried it at a few places and it was completely different every time.  This is in line with everything I've read on the strain which claims that the real Manatuska Thunder Fu...”

“After a not particularly pleasant experience with Durban Poison the night before, I tried MTF.  I had a medium sized hit ( ima lightweight) and let it go to work.  At the peak a few minutes later, I had a kind of drunky" feeling.  That feeling subsided pretty quickly and turned into a sort of focused feeling resulting in me making a salad with greater attention to detail than I normally would have.  It settled down ...”"

““Genetics: Haze x Northern Lights x Skunk x Highland Oaxacan Gold 

No way in any shape or form is that correct. MTF has been around since the early 70's well before Haze; Northern Light or even Skunk existed.

Nobody knows what the genetics are and it also does not taste or smell like chocolate. However ATF does smell like chocolate and fruit. ATF = MTF x Afghani


Very good but the real deal MTF is one of the stron...”

“I have been growing mtf for almost 6 years. I love the strain! It has a very good taste and leave a unique after flavor in your mouth. It will knock your socks off! Crystal content is off the charts!”

“Migraine pain 5; nausea 5 when I medicated round 2030. Noted some sweet undertones in taste. Takes bout 5 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. Head buzz heavy. No anxiety/paranoia but hard to do much. Bit of a couch lock; possibly had too much perhaps. Body high dang near perfect but coming down after 2 hours. After over 3 hours still super stoned but pain is returning. Going to have to try this one again before I...”

“MTF gives a mildly cerebral focused buzz, but the more I use in a session, the more intense the effects become - basically, use too much and you may actually feel thunder f#$@ed.  The effects are fairly long lasting and creep a bit but YMMV.  It tastes sweet, mildly spicy, and lemony to me.”

“After a not particularly pleasant experience with Durban Poison the night before, I tried MTF.  I had a medium sized hit ( ima lightweight) and let it go to work.  At the peak a few minutes later, I had a kind of drunky" feeling.  That feeling subsided pretty quickly and turned into a sort of focused feeling resulting in me making a salad with greater attention to detail than I normally would have.  It settled down ...”"

“I have been growing mtf for almost 6 years. I love the strain! It has a very good taste and leave a unique after flavor in your mouth. It will knock your socks off! Crystal content is off the charts!”

“Definately a great hybrid but not a personal fave. Body high was mild to moderate but euphoric creative energetic head buzz was nice but didn't last more than 30 mins. Id smoke again but wouldn't seek it out.”

“amazing strain. been smoking for years and this was my most satisfying high. I wasn't too keen on the smell 
but the high was euphoric, I was productive and it ended up being great in the bedroom.”
“I am one of those fortunate ones, also familiar with many strains; She has what is known as expansive smoke, and is strong, but gentle. Wouldn't dream of letting this one go in favor of another!!”

“Migraine comin on; nausea 4-5 when I medicated round 1830 or so. Takes bout 5 - 10 min to start working. I like this one better the 2nd time. Pain/nausea gone. Head buzz heavy; don't wanna do much. But considering I wanna go to bed that's a very good thing! Body high very nice. Highly recommend for after work/evening use.”

“Migraine pain 5; nausea 5 when I medicated round 2030. Noted some sweet undertones in taste. Takes bout 5 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. Head buzz heavy. No anxiety/paranoia but hard to do much. Bit of a couch lock; possibly had too much perhaps. Body high dang near perfect but coming down after 2 hours. After over 3 hours still super stoned but pain is returning. Going to have to try this one again before I...”

“amazing strain. been smoking for years and this was my most satisfying high. I wasn't too keen on the smell 
but the high was euphoric, I was productive and it ended up being great in the bedroom.”
“First run on this and I would say its pretty good stuff.  Nice happy high, no anxiety, relieved my stress.  Good balanced mind and body effects.  Fairly strong as well.  Didnt need too much.”

“If you are new to the weed scene, a word from the wise: Matanuska Thunder Fuck will hit you like a slow motion right hook from Matt Hughes. The first couple of hits (if you are a traditionalist and roll) are a little harsh but tolerable and it won't seem like it's doing much. Then it will wash over you like a wave. It is a creeping high and when it hits, you will be done for the day.  This is a close-out strain for t...”

“I love the Matanuska Thunder Fuck!! Just picked this up tonight on my way home and I love it! It's earthy and piney, and reminds me of it's Northern Lights roots. It smokes sweet and yummy, and gave me a great euphoric buzz. Totally a keeper Nate!”

“I am a very lucky Medical Cannabis Patient that has after nearly 50 years of Cannabis Growing and Consuming and in that time I have made fabulous connections with tonnes of Medical Patient Growers who continually reach out to me when new strains are in the offering.  This stain came out of a trade between a Matnauska Valley, Alaskan Grower and myself for Quebec Grown Gold Star Strains.

The Matanuska Thunder Fuck Sat...”

“Man, this stuff is darker than a new pair of indigo denim!  With dark orange hairs, it is quite exotic looking. It is much fluffier than it looks. 3 nice tokes. was the right amount. Heightened senses, especially hearing. Energetic, would have liked to lay back and listen, but I wanted to move around. This stuff could be great for hiking, listening to birds, babbling brooks, music festivals, etc. Not the strongest, b...”

“Best sativa I've ever had I was up I was relaxed enjoying my drive to AZ I did feel as tense I was in such a stoney mood I stopped and got a coffee and the little hole your supposed to sip out of I accidently held backwards and burned my nose. Overall excellent strain highly reccommend everyone tries it once you'll have a hard time finding the real deal in Cali though but good luck”
“By FAR the best strain out there right now!!!!  Great energy, great escape and flat out fun!!!  Huge fan of ever product, flower, oil and wax.... MTF!!!!!”

“I bought a 1g cartridge of MTF made by Green Haven LLC (good stuff btw). 

At first, without knowing any specifics of this strain, I was expecting an Alaskan Thunder Fuck type of smell, taste and high. This is completely different though. It may be sativa dominant, but after smoking I feel very relaxed and uplifted. The taste is very earthy and lingres, which I like. 10/10 would recommend!”

“Great smoke with an intense high....energetic, cerebral, love it.

Being a veteran smoker, I rolled a nice 1/2 gram blunt and proceeded to do my usual thing. Probably not such a good idea because damn, I AM STILL BLAZED and will be for awhile.....#nice420 #goodtimes”
“Still new to smoking, but this has been great for getting a few last things done before bed. Gives me some energy and  a relaxed brain, without the couchlock.”

“Man, this stuff is darker than a new pair of indigo denim!  With dark orange hairs, it is quite exotic looking. It is much fluffier than it looks. 3 nice tokes. was the right amount. Heightened senses, especially hearing. Energetic, would have liked to lay back and listen, but I wanted to move around. This stuff could be great for hiking, listening to birds, babbling brooks, music festivals, etc. Not the strongest, b...”

“I love the Matanuska Thunder Fuck!! Just picked this up tonight on my way home and I love it! It's earthy and piney, and reminds me of it's Northern Lights roots. It smokes sweet and yummy, and gave me a great euphoric buzz. Totally a keeper Nate!”

“This was an interesting strain for me and I'll need to keep trying it.

I enjoyed the high, mostly, because it was simultaneously calm and energizing but it was psychoactive in strange ways.

Now I'm pretty messed up in the head, which is why I smoke in the first place, but basically the matanuska made past and present bleed together weirdly. Not in a PTSD flashbacks kinda way because it wasn't panic inducing but rat...”

“Best sativa I've ever had I was up I was relaxed enjoying my drive to AZ I did feel as tense I was in such a stoney mood I stopped and got a coffee and the little hole your supposed to sip out of I accidently held backwards and burned my nose. Overall excellent strain highly reccommend everyone tries it once you'll have a hard time finding the real deal in Cali though but good luck”

“This was an interesting strain for me and I'll need to keep trying it.

I enjoyed the high, mostly, because it was simultaneously calm and energizing but it was psychoactive in strange ways.

Now I'm pretty messed up in the head, which is why I smoke in the first place, but basically the matanuska made past and present bleed together weirdly. Not in a PTSD flashbacks kinda way because it wasn't panic inducing but rat...”

“Great smoke with an intense high....energetic, cerebral, love it.

Being a veteran smoker, I rolled a nice 1/2 gram blunt and proceeded to do my usual thing. Probably not such a good idea because damn, I AM STILL BLAZED and will be for awhile.....#nice420 #goodtimes”

“I love the Matanuska Thunder Fuck!! Just picked this up tonight on my way home and I love it! It's earthy and piney, and reminds me of it's Northern Lights roots. It smokes sweet and yummy, and gave me a great euphoric buzz. Totally a keeper Nate!”

“This is listed as a daytime strain, but I came to use it as a panacea! This will be the most clear headed blunt you'll ever smoke. I suffer from fatigue and on top of that, I recently had the flu! With basically identical symptoms amplifying each-other- 1 draw of MTF and the aches and pains melt away. After work, MTF will understand that you still have things to do and work wonders usually delegated to a few beers."...”"

“I like this strain but I am knocking it back a star due to the level of psychosis. Don't get me wrong, I like that. It leaves me with a classic heady high but I do feel confused and disoriented so it would be very situational for me, like I just want to junk out and play video games for a few hours. I don't think it is versatile enough to be a normal daytime sativa strain. For that I would stick with something more c...”

“Man, this stuff is darker than a new pair of indigo denim!  With dark orange hairs, it is quite exotic looking. It is much fluffier than it looks. 3 nice tokes. was the right amount. Heightened senses, especially hearing. Energetic, would have liked to lay back and listen, but I wanted to move around. This stuff could be great for hiking, listening to birds, babbling brooks, music festivals, etc. Not the strongest, b...”

“I visited Alaska and tried some cannabis that I didn't know the name of. It completely eliminated the pain in my knee. I visited Las Vegas this weekend and found this MTF....same effects! The only strain to ever get rid of my knee pain, and uplifting as well. LOVE IT.”

“A great pleasure full to make à strain review for this formidable . Matanuska Thunder Fuck was one of the earliest strains that my Growfather got from his Vietnam War Vetrans Brothers in Arms who moved as far away from the Lower 48 States all the way up North to the Mythical Land of Freedom Alaska and we are situated in the very late 60's and the early 70's Yes Dorothy .  In 1973 we made a pilgrimage of a sort from P...”

“Great smoke with an intense high....energetic, cerebral, love it.

Being a veteran smoker, I rolled a nice 1/2 gram blunt and proceeded to do my usual thing. Probably not such a good idea because damn, I AM STILL BLAZED and will be for awhile.....#nice420 #goodtimes”

“I visited Alaska and tried some cannabis that I didn't know the name of. It completely eliminated the pain in my knee. I visited Las Vegas this weekend and found this MTF....same effects! The only strain to ever get rid of my knee pain, and uplifting as well. LOVE IT.”

“I bought a 1g cartridge of MTF made by Green Haven LLC (good stuff btw). 

At first, without knowing any specifics of this strain, I was expecting an Alaskan Thunder Fuck type of smell, taste and high. This is completely different though. It may be sativa dominant, but after smoking I feel very relaxed and uplifted. The taste is very earthy and lingres, which I like. 10/10 would recommend!”

Matanuska Thunder Fuck was one of the earliest strains that my Growfather got from his Vietnam War Vetrans Brothers in Arms who moved as far away from the Lower 48 States all the way up North to the Mythical Land of Freedom Alaska and we are situated in the very late 60's and the early 70's Yes Dorothy .  In 1973 we made a pilgrimage of a sort from P...”

“When serving USCG in Kodak, AK, a friend (who grew up in the Matanuska Valley) brought some from his families grow.  This was the ONLY weed that gave us all mad, killer rushes IMMEDIATELY & the only kind that ever got us high while tripping!  
It was the BEST pot I had even smoked, by far!  The bud he brought (10” small club) looked like no other strain I’d ever seen.  Leafs came around from each side of the stalk & ...”

“I love the Matanuska Thunder Fuck!! Just picked this up tonight on my way home and I love it! It's earthy and piney, and reminds me of it's Northern Lights roots. It smokes sweet and yummy, and gave me a great euphoric buzz. Totally a keeper Nate!”
“Back in the 90s, we used to get this stuff. Nice to see it's as much a mindf*ck as it always was. This stuff is no joke. One hit and I am high as a kite. Don't think I could leave the house though.”
“Very nice heavy relaxation head thumper.  Very well done compliments to the farmer”
“Great head buzz with a nice relaxing body high. I used it in a dry herb vape pen and it really snuck up on me nicely.”

“I am normally an Indica person. I really have a lot of body pain and need a heavy hitter to cope. I don't like to smoke a ton so it needs to taste delicious and be super effective.

MTF is all those things, It takes my pain away but helps me get shit done. Yesterday I spent six hours working almost nonstop, which used to be no small feat but the last few years was nearly impossible. It has been REALLY hard for me to ...”
“Where did you get it from. I keep looking but can't find it......please help! :) I will check back to see if you left a comment for me :D”

“Very active body buzz and cerebral euphoria. Quick head change and a very unique taste that is both fruity and spicy. Great for stress and fatigue, not so much for lack of appetite. Worthy of keeping some on hand in a cannabis cabinet.”
“The dabsap does not have a pleasurable  mouth taste. the smoke is harsh. the smell and the taste are different. as the turpene aroma is kind of lemony. but the flavor is not good.”
“one joint, seven people, all ripped”
“powerful indica high with very uplifting sativa qualities.”

“Powerful sativa high w/ enough relaxation not to be racy without producing paranoia; although, less experienced smokers might not agree... many other reviews seem to say otherwise.  My strain was grown / brand: Master Grown at 22%, Seattle, WA sept. 2015.”
“Clear mind, happy and peaceful”
“Heavy hitting and creepy and I wouldn’t have it any other way. Yo but it’s good in the morning”
“This strain was great for headaches and body pains. Great get up and clean, very nice.”
“Not the POW" the bud tender spoke of but very nice
column5: non-couchlocky buzz. Great for daytime and wake and bake.”"

column3: “rad bud.”

“Sirius Buds 20 pct thc. this is a pretty good strain as far as looks, smell and taste. It was called Dutch Thunderfuck on the package. the buds were very glossy and beautiful.  nice to break up and smelled great. almost a hint of lemon. or something alike.  it also burns slow and tastes pretty good”
“Went for a hike smoked a little and listened to The High Life" pod cast. This strain is a creeper in the best way. This will lift your mood and even make gloomy gray winter days bearable.”"
“old time weed, one of my favorite hybrids”
“Love this strain”
“Got it in a vape pen. First time ever vaping. loving it. tasty. nice nose tingle.”
“Wow!! What a cerebral change..very nice warm feeling of euphoria and comfort! Very fun strain to be use socially. Great for anxiety and stress. Smooth easy on the throat with some sweet undertones.”
“very tasty. the high is heavy too”
“Definitely lives up to the other reviews I has read before smoking. Great high. Super relaxing. Will def smoke again!”

“This strain by kynd is horrible. Well not all the way horrible as it looks amazing and even has a old school look to but i cant stand weed that is improperly flushed. When smoked it crackles and pops...the ashes are black. Im really curious how this crap got through to the dispensary.  There is a sweet taste that emerges through the chalky fireplace taste you experience.”
“my fav Sativa. Eufóric and energétic, perfect for the day timé.”

“Great sativa high that is very uplifting and energetic.  These are great for daytime and evening time due to that feeling of a good Indica hammer coming down dealing with insomnia and chronic pain knee pain.  His has become a favorite mind with a total buss time of about three hours.”

“I'd heard the name for years but today I got to try this strain for the first time.   It is earthy to taste and leaves the mouth dry.  The effects creep in and solved my ailments within a half hour.  It is good for relieving stomach pain and relaxing.  I highly recommend it for people with IBS and anxiety problems.”
“Hard hard strain goes like crazy shit man hard hard haaaard last one is quiet "too tuch im just i love this man matanuska thunder of shit man .”"
“This strain was great for headaches and body pains. Great get up and clean, very nice.”
“Dizamn.   I'm so happy.    This stuff is dizzzzope.    Thanks to Essence for thr reco boyyyy”

“I got some TJ's MTF down in Oregon. This quickly became a favorite strain. It came on fast and only took a few draws on the vaporizer to send me to that happy place.

I have tried ATF grown in AK, and the MTF stood head and shoulders over ATF in terms of taste and effect.”
“Picked some today from the dispensary westside, awesome buzz defiantly 5* plus their running a great special right now”

“MTF is a solid sativa. It’s a very positive and happy feeling high. Music and other good vibration things are perfectly paired with this bud. It’s a good day time smoke, it will definitely get you up and going. Or you might just zone out on stuff. Either way it’s chill. No paranoid thoughts, no anxiety. And definitely high af.”

“This is one of my most favourite strains ever, and I love its narcotic/sedating effects combined with some mental stimulation. But the problem is that here it says the strain is Sativa, is it really? Because here in spain, we call it Matanuska Tundra like in other eurpean places, but all the seed banks where I've asked for the strain, they ALWAYS say me this is a Pure Indica strain (makes me sense because of its narc...”

“has a slight odor of skunk, with a touch of sweetness/cocoa, picked it up from Cloud Nine Dispensary in Victoria BC, Canada. when grinded, it's mild odor becomes an overwhelming scent palette of hot chocolate with marshmallows. the smoke is smooth, and has an earthy quality to it, certainly is a creeper, but overall not so... off in space, as much as down to earth kind of high.”
“Toto?  I don't think we're in Alaska anymore.”
“Went for a hike smoked a little and listened to The High Life" pod cast. This strain is a creeper in the best way. This will lift your mood and even make gloomy gray winter days bearable.”"
“rad bud.”
“Heavy hitting and creepy and I wouldn’t have it any other way. Yo but it’s good in the morning”
“powerful indica high with very uplifting sativa qualities.”
“Where did you get it from. I keep looking but can't find it......please help! :) I will check back to see if you left a comment for me :D”
“Great head buzz with a nice relaxing body high. I used it in a dry herb vape pen and it really snuck up on me nicely.”
“A very unique strain. It kept me very happy throughout the high, and often spurred some deep thinking. Definitely one to smoke at home for a good night in.”

“I was very pleased to see a sativa on the $5 wall and yet a bit hesitant ......
Love love love it !
Great deal”
“great stoney high”
“Lovely for evening time. I catch myself spacing on the tv and my mouth is open, like the effort of closing my mouth is just to much work. Super relaxed and happy.”

“I bought this strain on October 1st. It was the first day weed was offered to recreational smokers. I asked my budtender for something to make me forget my 40th birthday was next week and this was what he suggested. Yeah, two weeks with no housework :) My description of this strain, My name is Otto
column4: and I love to get blotto!"”"

column3: “Pungent strain that smokes well but a little leafy. On exhale I always get a fresh hay taste in the back of my throat. For those two reasons I give this strain a 3/5. Other than those negatives, I enjoy the smell and big buds this plant produces. It is nice if you can get a good deal on it, as I would not pay top shelf prices for this.”
“I first tried this strain in Alaska 8 years ago and was one of my favorites. Naturally, I wanted to revisit my old friend and she didn't let me down. Great for anxiety and social settings.”

“Enjoying a particularly nice batch from TJ’s right now. Definitely not a subtle sativa, but also it’s quite smooth! Love the clear minded and energetic high. Can definitely see why this strain has a cult following, it is a special sativa.”
“everything about it is great ...taste like kush tho..but there is nothing wrong with that haha  ..”
“Nice relaxing hybrid”
“old time weed, one of my favorite hybrids”

“Sirius Buds 20 pct thc. this is a pretty good strain as far as looks, smell and taste. It was called Dutch Thunderfuck on the package. the buds were very glossy and beautiful.  nice to break up and smelled great. almost a hint of lemon. or something alike.  it also burns slow and tastes pretty good”

MTF is all those things, It takes my pain away but helps me get shit done. Yesterday I spent six hours working almost nonstop, which used to be no small feat but the last few years was nearly impossible. It has been REALLY hard for me to ...”
“The dabsap does not have a pleasurable  mouth taste. the smoke is harsh. the smell and the taste are different. as the turpene aroma is kind of lemony. but the flavor is not good.”

“Happy happy, joy joy, happy happy joy joy!  
Depression destroyer!  Instant paint & anxiety relief as well, very well rounded medicinal benefits.
If you need to turn that frown upside-down you should give Matanuska Thunder Fuck a try.  Honestly not my favorite flavor profile, on the woody side but will have to try the flower to get a better idea of it's taste.”
“Loved this strain! Strong smoke, dense, flavorful, and affect lasts a long time.”
“When your friend blows a big bong cloud in your face it feels like you're in Hawaii. It's all warm and moist and planty.”
“Good  but not awesome.”
“Good for kickn back and chilln. Make the vibes great and your surroundings.”
“Best paired with a comedy, or group of friends. Plenty of highs, without the lows; drink plenty of water.”
“very earthy, tastes almost like a mango but more earthy. Also some spice I can't pinpoint. Not that euphoric but definitely a little energetic”
“Good strain to relieve PTSD symptoms.”
“The flavor of the Matanuska Crumble & Shatter is one my favorites...I call it my daytime" choice.  I can function very well all day long!”"

“Super fuckin harsh, throat-wise. Effects... So far, very sativa-y. Racing thoughts, anxiousness, euphoria, wonderment. There are many words that come to mind. I am between a 3 and a 4 on this one, though it is closer to the 4 side. Find a reliable grower for this one; I think mine was a bit too heavy on the chemicals.”
“Love this stain:)”
“from what I remember, too much thc to be a 5.  choke city.”

“amazing! i smoke like 2 joints a day & have came up to a certain tolerate to not cough. but this had me coughing so much! i knew it was good at that point lol! but in all it got me aroused & really happy ;) good morning starter too.”

“Has a Sweet almost lime smell. It is unlike the chemical lemon/lime of OG/Chem. Very clean and floral. Bright orange on light green and white of Tric heads.
My body feels very stoned for a sativa. I live in Denver and smoke an 1/8 a day of some of the best cannabis on the planet. This got me extra high.”
“Great strain. Tried it for the first time tonight. Had a rough day with anxiety and migraine. Smoked a bowl and was functioning within 10 minutes.”

“absolutely love this strain, the nice lady with the marijuana necklace recommended it and I haven't looked back since. it's a very nice and smooth high with uplifting and relaxing effects and the smell is awesome!”
“Good vibes very euphoric and uplifting or just kickin back and chilln.”
“Great Sativa.”
“Smoked a pre roll this past weekend at the LV Hempfest ! Had a decent buzz, but probably wouldn't be at the top of my list ...”
“wanted 2 coment on emanuel80 review on mtf sat. I'm confused, method of use listed as flower
column4: smoke". Yet he says "dabbed". The bud was smoked in jay or bong

column3: “These buds are super frosty.. Light green colored with a nice sweet smell.  The buds burn kind of quick but they bring a tingly high at first then comes on to a strong head high..”
“Good vibes very euphoric and uplifting or just kickin back and chilln. High dont last long and tingly strong.”
“Great strain!!!”

“I love it for camping or anything active. While a very happy/uplifting warm feeling sets in right away but this strain can bring on that woah I'm pretty high" feeling too. So no mystery as to why I like it so much :) I recommend it as a good wake n bake strain for a dayoff or any outdoor chilling.”"

“Used this for butter to make rice crispy pebble treats. Great body buzz and wasn’t too couchy. 
The herb was fluffy and hairy lots of trichromes and smelled wonderfully dank. Lots of citrus notes”
